item.title: Kingdom Come Deliverance Enhanced Update Now Available
item.content:encoded:
The Enhanced Version of Kingdom Come Deliverance for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S has been released.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance’s enhanced update was leaked early last month via a PlayStation Store listing that revealed some of the features we can expect. It was also claimed that the update would arrive in early 2026, and the developers have confirmed this, along with a brand-new trailer.

Kingdom Come Deliverance Enhanced Update Shadow Dropped Today for PS5 and Xbox

As revealed in the press release, the Kingdom Come Deliverance Enhanced Update is available today on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S. What’s more, players that owned the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions can grab the update for free. The update is a reward to players as part of Kingdom Come Deliverance 2’s Anniversary Celebrations.

The PS5 and Xbox Series X/S update for Kingdom Come Deliverance provides players with 60 FPS, quality settings, and improved visual assets. The update is delivered by Warhorse Studios and Deep Silver, in collaboration with Saber Interactive. Interested readers can check out the new trailer below:

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Sells 5 Million Copies

Moreover, Warhorse Studios and Deep Silver announced a new milestone for Kingdom Come Deliverance 2, selling 5 million copies in the first year. Additionally, as part of the anniversary celebrations, players will get a personalized infographic documenting their stories adventuring through Bohemia.

The Kingdom Come: Deliverance Enhanced Update is available to download now, free for existing users, and can be purchased on the PlayStation and Xbox digital stores. The title with the next-gen update is also available to play for all Game Pass subscribers.

In other news, the creative director of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 has said that AI isn’t going anywhere soon. Will you be trying out Kingdom Come Deliverance’s Enhanced Update today? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Death Stranding 2’s PC launch bringing more modes and features for both platforms. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1701: Hints and Answer for February 14, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1701 for February 14, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, February 14, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1701 is a pretty easy puzzle for most players. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4 of 6 guesses. That makes almost a full guess easier than the 4.8-guess average from February 13.

General Wordle Hints For February 14

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word is often associated with change over time, not an instant event.
  • Hint 2: It’s commonly used in both literal and figurative contexts.
  • Hint 3: The word usually carries a positive or hopeful tone.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see it connected to growth or emergence than decline.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1701 for February 14, 2026.

Starter Words For February 14, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • BLOWS
  • MOODY
  • MOUND
  • BLIMP
  • GLOOM

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1701 On February 14, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: BLOOM

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

BLOOM can be both a noun and a verb. As a noun, it means “the flower of a plant” or “a flourishing, healthy condition; the time or period of greatest beauty, artistry, etc”. As a verb, it means “to flourish or thrive.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1700 on February 13, 2026

Answer: MOOCH

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1701?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on February 15 will be Wordle Game #1702.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…
